Serialized Form

  • Package restructureit.qualitymeasurement

    • Class restructureit.qualitymeasurement.Metrics extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • designSize

          double designSize
          Design Size in Class(DSC): Total number of classes in the design.

        • hierarchies

          double hierarchies
          Number of hierarchies(NOH): Total number of class hierarchies in the design.

        • abstraction

          double abstraction
          Average Number of Ancestors(ANA): Average number of classes from which a class inherits information.

        • encapsulation

          double encapsulation
          Data Access Metrics (DAM): Ratio of the number of private attributes to the total number of attributes declared in the class.

        • coupling

          double coupling
          Direct Class Coupling(DCC): Total count of different number of classes that a class is directly related to.

        • cohesion

          double cohesion
          Cohesion Among Methods in Class(CAM): Relatedness among methods of a class based upon the parameter list of methods.

        • composition

          double composition
          Measure of Aggregation(MOA): Extent of part-whole relationship, realized by using attributes.

        • inheritance

          double inheritance
          Measure of Functional Abstraction(MFA): Ratio of the number of methods inherited by a class to the total number of methods accessible by member methods of the class.

        • polymorphism

          double polymorphism
          Number of Polymorphic Methods(NOP): Count of the methods that can exhibit polymorphic behaviour.

        • messaging

          double messaging
          Class Interface Size(CIS): Count of the number of public methods in a class.

        • complexity

          double complexity
          Number of Methods(NOM): Count of all the methods defined in a class.

        • linesOfCode

          int linesOfCode
          Lines of code (LOC): count of the total lines of code in the project.

        • reusability

          double reusability
          Score of how reusable a program is. (-0.25 * Coupling) + (0.25 * Cohesion) + (0.5 * Messaging) + (0.5 * Design Size)

        • flexability

          double flexability
          Score of how flexible a program is. (0.25 * Encapsulation) – (0.25 * Coupling) + (0.5 * Composition) + (0.5 * Polymorphism)

        • understandability

          double understandability
          Score of how understandable the program is. (-0.33 * Abstraction) + (0.33 * Encapsulation) – (0.33 * Coupling) + (0.33 * Cohesion) – (0.33 * Polymorphism) – (0.33 * Complexity) – (0.33 * Design Size)

        • functionality

          double functionality
          Score for the functionality of the program. (0.12 * Cohesion) + (0.22 * Polymorphism) + (0.22 * Messaging) + (0.22 * Design Size) + (0.22 * Hierarchies)

        • extendability

          double extendability
          Score for how extendable a program is. (0.5 * Abstraction) – (0.5 * Coupling) + (0.5 * Inheritance) + (0.5 * Polymorphism)

        • effectiveness

          double effectiveness
          Score for effective the code of the program is. (0.2 * Abstraction) + (0.2 * Encapsulation) + (0.2 * Composition) + (0.2 * Inheritance) + (0.2 * Polymorphism)

        • qualityScore

          double qualityScore
          A score for the program that combines all the Quality Attribute scores.

        • qualityMetricIsSet

          java.util.ArrayList<E> qualityMetricIsSet
          A list to indicate which quality metrics have been set.

        • qualityAttributeIsCalculated

          java.util.ArrayList<E> qualityAttributeIsCalculated
          A list to indicate which quality attributes have been calculated.

        • numMetrics

          int numMetrics
          Number of quality metrics.

        • numQualityAttributes

          int numQualityAttributes
          Number of quality attributes.
